title: When going back exhaust WebView history first.
message:
When going back exhaust WebView history first.

In Android 4.4 links within same page (urls containing fragment only)
work without invoking shouldOverrideUrlLoading() and thus do not
update article view's history. WebView's own history is updated
though, so back button should first go back in WebView's own history.

title: Check header sanity before reading metadata, show error message toast.
message:
Check header sanity before reading metadata, show error message toast.

Dictionaries downloaded with command line tools may end up being html
(of error page for example) with .aar extension. Previously no checks
were made, attempt to load metadata was made, sometimes with random
huge value for metadata length which would crash the app with
OutOfMemoryError.

title: Revise application startup flow so that dictionary discovery is not
message:
Revise application startup flow so that dictionary discovery is not
run automatically (see issue 1).

Now the application will simply open previously opened
dictionaries. If none were open user will be presented with
Dictionaries activity to initiate SD card scan to find dictionaries
before proceeding to Lookup activity.

This should also fix intermittent search box breakage (see issue 2)
which appears to have been the result of looking for/loading
dictionaries progress dialogs popping up and stealing focus from the
search box at a bad moment.
